profileAlternative.name: Yuqi Zhang
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Nielsen
profileAlternative.summary:
Graduated from Columbia University, working at Nielsen as a data scientist on media data science:
• B.A. in Probability and Statistics, have taken courses including Probability, Inference, Measure Theory, Applied Stochastic Process, Algorithms and Data Structure(based on Python), Machine Learning and Data Mining.
• M.A. in Statistics, have taken courses including Algorithms in Data Science, Time Series Analysis, Bayesian Statistics, Machine Learning; take Reinforcement Learning, Advanced Machine Learning(Deep Learning) this semester.
• Proficient in Python and R. Familiar with SQL programming, Java, SAS, Hive, Presto, HDFS, Airflow and aws s3 system.
• Good at communication and teamwork. Have finished some projects in Modeling Competition in Mathematics(MCM) and Kaggle(rank first 15%).

• Programming: Python, SQL, R, Java, Scala, JavaScript, C++, SAS
• Cloud Computing: Pyspark, AWS S3, EMR, Apache Hadoop/Spark/Hive/HDFS, Airflow
• Modeling: Linear/Logistic/Ridge/Lasso Regression, Decision-Tree/SVM, NLP, Classification, KNN, K-Means Clustering, Bayesian Network, Stochastic Process, Monte-Carlo Simulation, CNN
• Languages: Chinese, English, German

Think like a software engineer, speak like a data scientist.
